resources.string: Because Facebook is too cool to follow the Android rules and loves to make developers life more difficult, it needs a button on its own.
I am using the app Movie Quotes and I need your help. What is the title of the movie with this quote?
You can either try again or ask your friends to help you because you are too stupid to find it by yourself.
Wow, you finished the game. Now you need to wait for more famous quotes to be added. Why don\'t you suggest one?
